messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
I can help with that—could you please share your current latitude and longitude? Once I have those coordinates, I can look up your city.

Without any location data, I can’t determine your city. If you’re on a device, you could:

• Provide your approximate street address, ZIP/postal code or a nearby landmark  
• Share your latitude & longitude if you can look them up  
• Enable location services and let me know when it’s on  

Let me know which you can do, and I’ll take it from there.
I can't do any of those either.

I’m sorry, but without any form of location data (coordinates, address, IP‐based location, enabled location services, etc.), I have no way to tell what city you’re in. If you’re ever able to share even approximate location information, let me know and I’ll be glad to help.
